title: India Neutralises Pak Missiles Aimed At 15 Cities, Destroys Air Defence System
content: India launched "Operation Sindoor", a retaliatory military strike against Pakistan following a missile attack targeting 15 Indian cities.  The operation involved neutralizing Pakistani missiles and destroying an air defense system in Lahore.

title: PM Modi Meets Army Chief After Pakistan's Missile Attack, India's Response
content: Following Pakistan's missile attack, Indian Prime Minister Modi met with the Army Chief to discuss India's response.  The meeting took place hours after the attempted attack.

title: "A Pretext To Target?" India Rubbishes Pak Claim Of Hitting Dam In PoK
content: India has refuted Pakistan's claims of hitting a dam in PoK (Pakistan-occupied Kashmir), stating that the claim is a pretext to target India.

title: Nipah Virus Case Confirmed In Kerala's Malappuram District, Woman Infected
content: A case of Nipah virus has been confirmed in Kerala's Malappuram district.  A woman has been infected.

title: "Stop Airing All Pakistani Shows, Films, Songs In India": Government
content: The Indian government has issued a new advisory to stop airing all Pakistani shows, films, OTT series, and songs in India.

title: President grants prosecution sanction against Lalu Prasad in land-for-jobs ‘scam’
content: India's President approves the prosecution of Lalu Prasad in a land-for-jobs scam.

title: Operation Sindoor LIVE: India says choice of de-escalation is with Pakistan
content: Following the Pahalgam attack, India launched Operation Sindoor, targeting terrorist camps in Pakistan.  The Foreign Secretary stated that India hit air defense systems in Pakistan.

title: Operation Sindoor: PM Modi chairs meeting with Ministries amid heightened security concerns
content: Prime Minister Modi chaired a high-level meeting to review national preparedness and inter-ministerial coordination due to heightened security concerns following Operation Sindoor.

title: Government advises OTT platforms to stop streaming Pakistan-origin content
content: The Indian government advised OTT platforms to halt the streaming of content originating from Pakistan.

title: Cash discovery row: CJI Khanna shares inquiry report, Justice Varma’s response with President, PM Modi
content: Chief Justice Khanna shared an inquiry report and Justice Varma’s response with the President and Prime Minister Modi regarding a cash discovery controversy.

title: What could be in the UK-US tariff deal?
content: The two nations will announce a deal to reduce tariffs today - here's what could be in it.

title: LIVE India says it hit Pakistan air defences and accuses Islamabad of drone strikes
content: Islamabad has said separately it shot down 25 Indian drones as tensions continue to mount after Wednesday's strikes.

title: LIVE Trump about to reveal details of US-UK trade deal in Oval Office news conference
content: The deal will be unveiled from 10:00 ET / 15:00 BST, and is expected to reduce tariffs on certain US and UK goods.

title: Dozens of pro-Palestinian protesters arrested at Columbia University
content: The university asked for police help after protesters occupied part of the main library on Wednesday.

title: Pope Francis backed him when he took on a president. Now he's voting in the conclave
content: Cardinal David tells the BBC.

title: Trump to Announce Trade Deal With U.K., His First Since Imposing Tariffs
content: President Trump said he would announce “a full and comprehensive” trade agreement with Britain, but details of the agreement were not yet clear.

title: E.U. Unveils a Plan to Hit Back at the U.S. if Trade Negotiations Fail
content: Boeing and big U.S. food producers could end up in the cross-hairs if the bloc follows through on its threat to impose new tariffs on more American goods.

title: Black Smoke Signals That Cardinals Still Haven’t Chosen a Pope
content: Voting was inconclusive. The conclave will reconvene in the afternoon, with two more votes expected today, unless a pontiff is chosen in the first round.

title: The $200 Billion Gamble: Bill Gates’s Plan to Wind Down His Foundation
content: In a wide-ranging interview, he explains his decision — amid the Trump administration’s assault on foreign aid — to accelerate the end of his giving.

title: Streets That Look Like Gaza: Contours of New Israeli Offensive Unfold in West Bank
content: An Israeli military operation has displaced tens of thousands of Palestinians in West Bank cities. Some fear it may be laying the ground to annex the territory.
